answers.response: The basketball practice was longer than expected.
I saw a lost kid and was getting them to the police station.
I was robbed. My bike was stolen. Oh well, at least I didn’t get hurt.
*Shyly. Sorry… I was too nervous to leave the house…

question: You don't look well. Are you sick or something?

answers.response: I ate a bit too much for lunch. It seems, but it was enough calories for me for today.
I see you don’t order that much either.
The more food, the more chewing.
Haha… It’s embarrassing. I’m trying to lose weight.
Very little. The boss didn’t assign me much task today.
I made a mistake today. I hope the customer doesn’t get angry and complain to my boss.
I was stuck with a hard problem, but I think I’ll solve it tomorrow.
I interviewed some candidates for the company. It was a lot of fun talking to them.
Couldn’t be better.
Enough energy to run a mile.
Good. I think I had enough sleep last night.
Just want to stay home.

Yes, listening to it on headphone makes me comfortable.

question: So what do you like to do when you are free?

answers.response: I like to go hiking.
I listen to songs and play instruments. Music helps me relax and calm.
I like to read and play games.
Nothing, why do anything extra when we’ll all die anyway.

question: What kind of movies do you like?

answers.response: Action! Explosions and fight scenes always make me hype.
Romance and historical. Watching characters interacting is interesting to me.
Not a genre but something soft and timid. Nice music is also a plus.
Horror, for the thrills. Also seeing how characters fight to survive is motivating.

question: Do you hang hangout with friends often?

answers.response: Yeah, I usually just follow whatever they wanted to do that day.
Yeah, hanging out with my friends and share stuff with each other is healthy.
… I don’t have friends…
No relationship last forever, so I don’t see a need for friends.
Yes! I always plan out a place or two every year to visit.
Yes. Experiencing and learning other cultures help making my thinking diverse.
Of course! Traveling is a must for a free spirit!
Not really. You can watch everything on the internet, so I think traveling is a waste of money, to be honest.

question: What do you do when you talk with a stranger?

answers.response: I keep quiet and mostly listen.
I observed them carefully and choose my words accordingly.
I tried to keep the energy high. Ask them questions about themselves always work.
I tried to end the conversation and get away as quick as possible.
